DFileBrowser/Clear.description: Clears the file tree and list, and resets all values.

DFileBrowser/GetBaseFolder.description: Returns the root directory/folder of the file tree.

DFileBrowser/GetCurrentFolder.description: Returns the current directory/folder being displayed.

DFileBrowser/GetFileTypes.description: Returns the current file type filter on the file list.

DFileBrowser/GetModels.description: Returns whether or not the model viewer mode is enabled. In this mode, files are displayed as

DFileBrowser/GetName.description: Returns the name being used for the file tree.

DFileBrowser/GetOpen.description: Returns whether or not the file tree is open.

DFileBrowser/GetPath.description: Returns the access path of the file tree. This is

DFileBrowser/GetSearch.description: Returns the current search filter on the file tree.

DFileBrowser/OnDoubleClick.description: Called when a file is double-clicked.

DFileBrowser/OnRightClick.description: Called when a file is right-clicked.

DFileBrowser/OnSelect.description: Called when a file is selected.

DFileBrowser/SetBaseFolder.description: Sets the root directory/folder of the file tree.

DFileBrowser/SetCurrentFolder.description: Sets the directory/folder from which to display the file list.

DFileBrowser/SetFileTypes.description: Sets the file type filter for the file list.

DFileBrowser/SetModels.description: Enables or disables the model viewer mode. In this mode, files are displayed as

DFileBrowser/SetName.description: Sets the name to use for the file tree.

DFileBrowser/SetOpen.description: Opens or closes the file tree.

DFileBrowser/SetPath.description: Sets the access path for the file tree. This is set to

DFileBrowser/SetSearch.description: Sets the search filter for the file tree.
